infos.value: Equipping a vision card will bestow various effects not only on the unit it is equipped to, but also on the entire party.
Activating many party abilities will result in significant buffs for your party.
Vision cards can also be enhanced and awakened.
With that, let us enhance a vision card.
I have prepared the necessary materials, so go ahead and use them.
Try awakening a vision card again later once you have obtained the necessary materials.
Vision cards feature illustrations and anecdotal passages. Feel free to appreciate them when you have a spare moment.
• Vision Cards •

• Vision Cards •
Equipping a vision card will bring out certain abilities. The card's stats will be added to the unit, and set abilities will activate.
• Vision Cards II •
There are two types of vision card abilities: <color=#00ffff>Bestowed Effects</color> and <color=#00ffff>Party Abilities</color>.
• Abilities •

• Bestowed Effects •
These are abilities that manifest in the unit to which the card is equipped.
• Party Abilities •

• Party Abilities •
These are abilities that manifest in all units in the party.
• Party Abilities II •
<color=#00ffff>With the exception of compound effects</color>, <color=#00ffff>all effects</color> of a Party Ability will trigger in <color=#00ffff>all units</color>.
• Enhancement •

• Enhancement •
You can enhance vision cards by utilizing Growth Eggs.
• Enhancement II •
<color=#00ffff>Leveling up</color> will <color=#00ffff>increase</color> the card's <color=#00ffff>stats</color> and <color=#00ffff>abilities</color>.
• Awakening •

• Awakening •
You can awaken vision cards by collecting the necessary materials.
• Awakening II •

Awakening the card will <color=#00ffff>increase its level cap</color>, endow it with <color=#00ffff>additional abilities</color>, and <color=#00ffff>strengthen</color> its <color=#00ffff>Party Abilities</color>.
• Vision Abilities •
Some vision cards also possess <color=#00ffff>Ability Commands</color>.
